abstract: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey Police Dept opens disciplinary cases against 44 officers found to have neglected their duties in PATH train system during overnight shifts.

headline.print_headline: 40 Port Authority Officers  Suspected of Shirking Duty
headline.main: 40 Port Authority Officers Could Be Disciplined in Neglect of Duty

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Several officers were found to have spent more than six hours of their shifts in a break room, the agency’s Police Department said in a news release....
lead_paragraph: Several officers were found to have spent more than six hours of their shifts in a break room, the agency’s Police Department said in a news release.
